titleStmt.title: A declaration of the General Convention of Ireland expressing their detestation of the unjust proceedings against the late King, in a pretended high court of justice in England.
titleStmt.author: Ireland. General Convention.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted at Dublin by W. Bladen, and re-printed at London by John Macock,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
